review_title: Senior Reproductive health commodities supply chain advisor
job_title: Maternal Health Products Supply Chain Advisor in Addis Ababa
pros:
Helps staffs to be engaged in research engagement. Support staffs to be involved in shared decision making. Build staffs to work in a team and in harmony.
Works in building the capacity of teaching institute to be able to serve needy community
cons:
Frequent change of organizational focus and project implementation direction.
Couldn't make staffs come to the same level of understanding of the scope of the project.
